references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper is foundational for diffusion models, introducing the use of nonequilibrium thermodynamics for deep unsupervised learning.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a key advancement in diffusion model development.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper significantly improved diffusion models by introducing the use of stochastic differential equations for score-based generative modeling.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive analysis of the design space of diffusion models, offering crucial insights into their functionality and limitations.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the successful application of diffusion models to high-resolution image synthesis, a significant achievement in the field.
